00010 // The base class for all Pulse Sub Records. Currently, however, this data
00011 // is not stored in the Event classes because we don't read directly from the Samba files
00012 // at the moment. This will possibly change one day in the future.

00021 KBoloPulseSubRecord::KBoloPulseSubRecord(void)
00022 {       
00023         
00024         InitializeMembers();
00025         
00026         //we must take care of members on the heap differently
00027         //than members created on the stack.
00028         fChannelNameSize=0;
00029         fChannelName=0;
00030         
00031 }
00032 
00033 KBoloPulseSubRecord::KBoloPulseSubRecord(const KBoloPulseSubRecord &aRec)
00034 : KSubRecord(aRec)
00035 {
00036         CopyLocalMembers(aRec);
00037         fChannelNameSize=0;
00038         fChannelName=0;
00039         SetChannelName(aRec.GetChannelName().data(), aRec.GetChannelNameSize());
00040         
00041 }
00042 
00043 KBoloPulseSubRecord& KBoloPulseSubRecord::operator=(const KBoloPulseSubRecord &aRec)
00044 {
00045         if(&aRec == this) return *this;
00046         
00047         this->KSubRecord::operator=(aRec);
00048         CopyLocalMembers(aRec);
00049         
00050         SetChannelName(aRec.GetChannelName().data(), aRec.GetChannelNameSize());
00051         
00052         return *this;
00053 }
00054 
00055 void KBoloPulseSubRecord::CopyLocalMembers(const KBoloPulseSubRecord &aRec)
00056 {
00057         SetPeakAmp(aRec.GetPeakAmp());
00058         SetBaselineMean(aRec.GetBaselineMean());
00059         SetBaselineFWHM(aRec.GetBaselineFWHM());
00060 }
00061 
00062 KBoloPulseSubRecord::~KBoloPulseSubRecord(void)
00063 {
00064         //Does calling clear at destruction take too much computing time?
00065   Clear("C");
00066         
00067         if(fChannelName!=0){
00068                 delete[] fChannelName;
00069                 fChannelNameSize=0;
00070                 fChannelName=0;
00071         }
00072 }
00073 
00074 void KBoloPulseSubRecord::Clear(Option_t *anopt)
00075 {
00076         
00077         //Clear the base classes and then clear/delete any local
00078   //members. Its necessary for this Clear method to exist
00079   //in the case that instances of this object are stored
00080   //inside of a TClonesArray
00081   //Also, if this class holds any TClonesArrays, it must call
00082   //TClonesArray::Clear("C")
00083         KSubRecord::Clear(anopt);
00084         
00085   //Clear and delete local objects here. 
00086         if(fChannelName!=0){
00087                 delete[] fChannelName;
00088                 fChannelNameSize=0;
00089                 fChannelName=0;
00090         }
00091         
00092   //Re initialize local members here and prepare for the next use of this class.
00093   InitializeMembers();
00094         
00095 }
00096 
00097 void KBoloPulseSubRecord::InitializeMembers(void)
00098 {
00099   //WARNING - THIS METHOD SHOULD NEVER ALLOCATE SPACE FOR POINTERS
00100   //ONLY SET MEMBERS ON THE STACK TO THEIR INITIAL VALUES
00101         
00102         SetPeakAmp(-99.0);
00103         SetBaselineMean(-99.0);
00104         SetBaselineFWHM(-99.0);
00105         
00106 }
00107 
00108 
00109 void KBoloPulseSubRecord::SetChannelName(const Char_t* aWord, Int_t aSize)
00110 {
00111         if(aSize!=fChannelNameSize){
00112                 if(fChannelName!=0){
00113                         delete[] fChannelName;
00114                         fChannelName = 0;
00115                         fChannelNameSize = 0;
00116                 }
00117                 if(aSize>0) fChannelName= new Char_t[aSize];
00118                 fChannelNameSize=aSize;
00119         }
00120         if(aSize>0) memcpy(fChannelName, aWord, fChannelNameSize*sizeof(Char_t));
00121 }
00122 
00123 Bool_t KBoloPulseSubRecord::IsSame(const KBoloPulseSubRecord &aRec, Bool_t bPrint) const
00124 {
00125         Bool_t bIsEqual = true; //assume its true, then test for differences
00126         
00127         //call the base class's IsSame methods
00128         if(!this->KSubRecord::IsSame(aRec,bPrint)){
00129                 bIsEqual = false;
00130                 if(!bPrint)
00131                         return false;  //if we're not printing out, just return false at first failure
00132                 //the operator== method uses this functionality.
00133         }
00134 
00135         if(fChannelNameSize != aRec.fChannelNameSize){
00136                 bIsEqual = false;
00137                 if (bPrint) 
00138                         cout << "KBoloPulseSubRecord fChannelNameSize Not Equal. lhs: " 
00139                         << fChannelNameSize << " != rhs " << aRec.fChannelNameSize << endl;             
00140                 else
00141                         return false;  
00142         }
00143         
00144         if(strncmp(fChannelName, aRec.fChannelName, sizeof(Char_t)*fChannelNameSize)){
00145                 bIsEqual = false;
00146                 if (bPrint) 
00147                         cout << "KBoloPulseSubRecord fChannelName Not Equal. lhs: " 
00148                         << fChannelName << " != rhs " << aRec.fChannelName << endl;             
00149                 else
00150                         return false;  
00151         }
00152         
00153         if(fPeakAmp != aRec.fPeakAmp){
00154                 bIsEqual = false;
00155                 if (bPrint) 
00156                         cout << "KBoloPulseSubRecord fPeakAmp Not Equal. lhs: " 
00157                         << fPeakAmp << " != rhs " << aRec.fPeakAmp << endl;             
00158                 else
00159                         return false;  
00160         }
00161         
00162         if(fBaselineMean != aRec.fBaselineMean){
00163                 bIsEqual = false;
00164                 if (bPrint) 
00165                         cout << "KBoloPulseSubRecord fBaselineMean Not Equal. lhs: " 
00166                         << fBaselineMean << " != rhs " << aRec.fBaselineMean << endl;           
00167                 else
00168                         return false;  
00169         }
00170         
00171         if(fBaselineFWHM != aRec.fBaselineFWHM){
00172                 bIsEqual = false;
00173                 if (bPrint) 
00174                         cout << "KBoloPulseSubRecord fBaselineFWHM Not Equal. lhs: " 
00175                         << fBaselineFWHM << " != rhs " << aRec.fBaselineFWHM << endl;           
00176                 else
00177                         return false;  
00178         }
00179         
00180         return bIsEqual;
00181 }

00184 void KBoloPulseSubRecord::Compact(void)
00185 {
00186         //make the event class as small as possible. this calls 'Compact' for all member
00187         //variables that are KDS classes, member variables that can be compacted (such as TBits)
00188         //and base classes
00189         
00190         KSubRecord::Compact();
00191 }
